predictions.text: The U.S. 30-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS30) will close at or below 4.60% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm a daily close at or below 4.60% using FRED series DGS30 or Treasury/Haver/Bloomberg end-of-day data; date measured in UTC.
monitoring_signals: CPI/PCE and ISM prints below expectations
Fed communication indicating cuts or earlier easing
MOVE index and term premia declines
Large risk-off moves driving duration bids
predictions.rationale: Cooling inflation and lower mortgage rates suggest easing term premia; any growth scare or risk-off could pull long yields down.

predictions.text: U.S. Housing Starts (SAAR) for October 2025 will print between 1.30 million and 1.42 million in the Census release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in U.S. Census Bureau New Residential Construction news release: Housing Starts (seasonally adjusted annual rate) for October 2025 within stated range.
predictions.rationale: Lower rates support activity, but affordability and supply frictions keep starts in a restrained mid-range.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, BIS will publish a new rule (interim/final) tightening U.S. export controls on China related to AI software/model weights or EDA tools, as posted on federalregister.gov.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm a BIS rule on federalregister.gov that explicitly tightens China-related controls for AI software/model weights or relevant software categories.
monitoring_signals: Pre-publication notices or BIS press releases
White House/NSC statements on China tech restrictions
Congressional letters advocating tighter AI controls
predictions.rationale: Policy momentum and signaling ahead of U.S.–China talks point to further tightening on software and AI controls.

predictions.text: AMD (AMD) Q3 2025 Data Center segment revenue year-over-year growth will be between 25% and 45%, per the company’s earnings release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check AMD’s Q3 2025 earnings press release/10-Q for Data Center segment revenue and calculate YoY growth; reported (not FX-adjusted).
monitoring_signals: Competitive updates from Nvidia and Intel
predictions.rationale: AI server demand and share gains support strong growth, tempered by supply constraints and competitive dynamics.

predictions.text: COMEX Gold front-month futures will settle at or above $2,550 per troy ounce on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via CME/COMEX official settlement for the active front-month gold futures contract closing at or above $2,550.
predictions.rationale: Potential geopolitical flare-ups and softer real yields could catalyze a flight to safety and higher gold prices.

predictions.text: USD/JPY (Yahoo Finance: JPY=X) will trade at or below 148.00 on at least one UTC trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify intraday trade at or below 148.00 using reliable FX data sources (Yahoo Finance JPY=X or major FX platforms), measured in UTC.
predictions.rationale: Intervention risk and narrowing rate differentials could briefly strengthen the yen despite broader USD strength.

predictions.text: ICE Brent crude oil front-month futures will settle at or above $90.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm ICE Brent front-month official settlement at or above $90.00 using ICE data or reputable market data providers.
predictions.rationale: Tighter enforcement on Russian oil and geopolitical risks could tighten balances and lift Brent temporarily.

predictions.text: Euro area HCOB Manufacturing PMI (final) for October 2025 will print between 45.0 and 47.0.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify the final October 2025 Euro area manufacturing PMI level in the S&P Global/HCOB press release; value must be within range.
monitoring_signals: Energy price moves impacting input costs
predictions.rationale: Manufacturing remains subdued amid weak external demand and lingering energy cost pressures.

predictions.text: U.S. PCE Price Index (headline, MoM, SA) for September 2025 will print between 0.1% and 0.3% in the BEA release due by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check BEA Personal Income and Outlays report for September 2025 headline PCE MoM SA; confirm it lies within 0.1%–0.3%.
predictions.rationale: Recent CPI/PPI trends imply modest but positive PCE inflation, consistent with gradual disinflation.

predictions.text: From 2025-10-24 close to 2025-11-30 close, Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight ETF (RSP) will underperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust (SPY) by at least 1.5 percentage points based on adjusted close percentage change.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute percentage change in adjusted close for RSP and SPY from 2025-10-24 close to 2025-11-30 close; confirm RSP minus SPY ≤ -1.5pp using Yahoo Finance or equivalent.
monitoring_signals: Breadth indicators and equal-weight vs cap-weight ratios
predictions.rationale: AI-driven mega-cap leadership likely persists into earnings, pressuring equal-weight relative performance.
